short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension efficiently adds utm tracking links to your current active tab, brought to you by Fede Behrens @rafabehrens

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension pulls the current url from your active tab and enables you to easily add source, medium and campaign utm tracking tags to it. Currently in Alpha - Email frbbehrens@gmail.com to request features, or ask any questions. See the source code here: https://github.com/FedeBehrens/QuickTrack-Alpha-v1.2, chat to me on twitter @rafabehrens
